title: Yes Virginia, There Is A Santa Claus (1991) (Subs Included)
description:
Yes Virginia, There Is a Santa Claus (1991) (TV) 

The 1991 TV Christmas movie Yes Virginia there is a Santa Claus with Charles Bronson.	

Storyline

While newspaper writer Church struggles with the death of his wife, he receives a "special" assignment. He must answer a little girl's question about whether Santa Claus really exists. Based on a true story. Written by Anthony Brock.

Duration	  :01:27:18
Chapters	  :18
Video/resolution  :MPEG-2 NTSC (30 Fps) 4:3 Full-Screen (720x480)
Spoken Audio	  :English, AC3, 2 Channels. 

======================================
The ISO File has.... 

Basic menu and scene selection.
The Video as well as the Audio was enhanced for clarity and sound.

All the Subs are listed via the menu but also can be selected once the Video begins as well.  

Subtitles :
Track 1 - English
Track 2 - French
Track 3 - Spanish
Track 4 - Italian
Track 5 - Portuguese
Track 6 - German/Dutch

Note: Subs for this video was created by me and translated using Google Translator for the other languages. 
=========================================
The MP4 Video is just the video without any sub tracks included or embedded.
